item.title: Maximizing Productivity: Cloud Development with Visual Studio and Dev Box
item.description:
Discover how Microsoft engineers have revolutionized their .NET development with Microsoft Dev Box and Visual Studio. Learn how they have streamlined their development processes using various task-focused cloud development tools. Gain practical insights into coding, testing, and deploying applications from the cloud, and explore the latest and most advanced features of Visual Studio and Dev Box.
Connect with .NET: Blog: https://aka.ms/dotnet/blog Twitter: https://aka.ms/dotnet/twitter TikTok: https://aka.ms/dotnet/tiktok Mastodon: https://aka.ms/dotnet/mastodon LinkedIn: https://aka.ms/dotnet/linkedin Facebook: https://aka.ms/dotnet/facebook Docs: https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet Forums: https://aka.ms/dotnet/forums 🙋‍♀️Q&A: https://aka.ms/dotnet-qa 👨‍🎓Microsoft Learn: https://aka.ms/learndotnet
#dotnet #dotnetconf #devbox

item.title: 3 Powerful Design Patterns You Should Know About
item.description:
Link to the courses (promo code PATTERNS20): Creational Design Patterns: https://dometrain.com/bundle/creational-design-patterns-in-csharp?coupon_code=PATTERNS20&ref=amichai-mantinband&promo=youtube Structural Design Patterns: https://dometrain.com/bundle/structural-design-patterns-in-csharp?coupon_code=PATTERNS20&ref=amichai-mantinband&promo=youtube Behavioral Design Patterns: https://dometrain.com/bundle/behavioral-design-patterns-in-csharp?coupon_code=PATTERNS20&ref=amichai-mantinband&promo=youtube
Support the channel and get access to our discord: https://www.patreon.com/amantinband
In today's video we'll cover 3 design patterns that I personally really like and I think will make a MASSIVE difference if applied when appropriate.
Thanks for watching, love you 🫶
item.author: (Amichai Mantinband)
